section.name: Casting Spells - a.k.a Using Magic
section.p: Using magic requires a little disipline concerning project organization.
Using magic means faster and more reliable build processes.

This section contains information setting up a project
index, creating a build file, and casting your first spell. By the time you finish reading the material contained here you will be well on your way to passing your next exam - "Defence Against the Dark Arts".
